attributes.action: Stop Restricting The Right To Protest
attributes.additional_details:
The government is silencing the voice of the public. They want to restrict the rights to protest which completely destroys the point of protesting. 

The whole point of a protests is for it to be peaceful but make a point. Restricting where a protest can be and giving the police the ability to stop a protest happing in a specific public area would be an attack on the rights of the people in the United Kingdom
attributes.background:
We want the government to stop attacking innocent people. People who just want a voice and actually focus on the real issues, going on in the country and globally. 

To silence protests is to silence the people of this country.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

Or you may wish to sign this petition: "Repeal the Public Order Act 2023 & Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Act 2022" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734380
